text:
The 2015 Hospital of Tomorrow Conference: Join the Conversation Follow the hashtag #USNHOT15 for live tweets from the U.S. News Hospital of Tomorrow conference. Keep pace with the U.S. News Hospital of Tomorrow conference via Twitter.
By U.S. News Staff Oct. 14, 2015 | 3:26 p.m. EDT + More In recent years, big marketplace and government forces have led to seismic shifts in the health care industry, leading to major changes and new thinking for the future of U.S. health care.
Follow the hashtag #USNHoT15 for live Tweets of the entire U.S. News Hospital of Tomorrow conference , or use the handles for speakers, moderators and their organizations (below) to continue the conversation online.
